email.title: Weekly Digest
email.text:
It's Monday!
We're kicking the week off with a whopping TWO events, happening TODAY! First is the Docker workshop, which you might find useful if you're either taking Distributed Algorithms or will use Docker during a summer internship. Following that is our Valentine's Bar Night, taking place from 19.00 in Metric. Tomorrow (Tuesday) we're holding our Internship 101 event, where you can find out about internships at companies that are still hiring from past interns. And on Thursday we're running a Kotlin workshop at 18.30, which follows the lunchtime iPr0gram talk on the same day.
Definitely a packed week! Check out below for more details and keep the biscuit suggestions coming!
email.heading: Docker Workshop

event.text: HAPPENING TODAY! Docker is a tool designed to make it easier to create, deploy, and run applications by using containers. Containers allow a developer to package up an application with all of the parts it needs, such as libraries and other dependencies, and ship it all out as one package. This workshop is targeted to those who want to learn about the basics of Docker. If you are taking Distributed Algorithms (CO347), this workshop will definitely help you with the course. You may also encounter Docker in some format during a placement or internship this summer.. This workshop will be hosted by Abhinav Mishra.

email.heading: The Valentine's Bar Night

event.text: HAPPENING TODAY! It's time for the first Bar Night of 2018! Once again, we'll be meeting in Metric at 7pm for an evening of free drinks and great conversation. Drinks tokens will be given upon entry for FREE to any member of DoCSoc. Tokens are valid for both alcoholic and non-alcoholic drinks.

email.heading: Internship 101
JetBrains: Kotlin Hands-On
email.sign:
That's all for now!
Until next time,
email.text: This week's biscuit brought to you by: Anonymous. [Submit Biscuit](https://docsoc.co.uk/suggest-biscuit).
